EmailTemplate.subject: The MathWorks Training Registered Awaiting Payment for Exam
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Enrollment__c.Enrollee_Name__c},
MathWorks has received your enrollment request for the {!Class__c.Course__c} . In order to confirm your registration, you must review and accept the terms within our Certification Program Agreement:
EXAM DETAILS
EXAM NAME: {!Class__c.Course__c} DATES: {!Enrollment__c.Exam_Date__c} LOCATION: {!Class__c.City__c}, {!Class__c.State__c} TIME: {!Class__c.Start_Time__c} to {!Class__c.End_Time__c}
Full payment must be received before the commencement of the exam. Your enrollment is not confirmed until we have received full payment.
To pay by credit card, please call {!Class__c.Sponsor_Office_Phone__c} to speak with a representative.
To pay by Purchase Order, please fax the PO to us at +612 86694710 Attn: Training
To pay by check, please mail it to:
The MathWorks Australia, Pty Ltd Level 6, Tower 2 475, Victoria Avenue Chatswood 2067 Attention: Customer Training
Cancellation/Return Policies ----------------------------- Candidates who cancel their exam forfeit their exam fee.
If an exam cannot take place as scheduled due to circumstances beyond MathWorks reasonable control, MathWorks sole responsibility shall be to refund the cost of the exam in which you are enrolled or transfer you to a future exam offering. However, MathWorks does not refund for any expenses incurred beyond the cost of the exam.
Inclement Weather Policy ----------------------------- The MathWorks intends to maintain its regularly scheduled exam, avoiding closings due to inclement weather whenever possible. However, if weather factors are unfavourable and not expected to improve, courses and exams will be cancelled for the day. For information about cancellations due to inclement weather, please contact the training facility directly. If a cancellation is inevitable, you will receive an email from MathWorks, including options for rescheduling.
If you have any questions, please contact us at {!Class__c.Sponsor_Office_Email__c}
Thank you,
Training Services {!Class__c.Sponsor_Office_Signature__c}
